subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Matt Johnson threw four of his career-high five touchdown passes in the first half, and Bowling Green (10-3) routed No. 16 Northern Illinois, 47-27, in Detroit for the Mid-American Conference title.
snippet: Matt Johnson threw four of his career-high five touchdown passes in the first half, and Bowling Green (10-3) routed No. 16 Northern Illinois, 47-27, in Detroit for the Mid-American Conference title.
